text:
Any rent charged for housing, whether investigated
under MSPA or OSHAct, must meet the requirements under MSPA for fully disclosed
deductions, and must comport with FLSA 3(m) for reasonable costs for facilities
provided, if those Acts apply to the employment.  (See FOH 30c13.)  Housing for
H-2A covered workers must be provided at no cost to the workers who are not
reasonably able to return to their permanent residence.
